technical_evidence.title: Satellites Cannot Exist in Vacuum
technical_evidence.description: Satellites require atmosphere to maintain orbit. In vacuum, they would fall. The physics don't work.
technical_evidence.technical_details: Orbital mechanics require atmospheric drag. No atmosphere = no orbit. Satellites cannot maintain position in vacuum.

technical_evidence.title: Van Allen Radiation Belt - Impossible to Pass
technical_evidence.description: Van Allen radiation belt would kill astronauts. Impossible to pass through. Moon landing impossible.
technical_evidence.technical_details: Radiation levels lethal. No protection possible. Space travel through belt impossible.

technical_evidence.title: Temperature Extremes - Impossible to Survive
technical_evidence.description: Space has extreme temperatures. No protection possible. Human survival impossible.
technical_evidence.technical_details: Extreme heat and cold. No protection. Human survival impossible in space.

technical_evidence.title: No Real Photos of Earth from Space
technical_evidence.description: All photos of Earth from space are CGI or composite. No real photos exist.
technical_evidence.technical_details: All photos are computer-generated or composited. No authentic photos of Earth from space exist.

technical_evidence.title: Satellite Orbits Are Impossible
technical_evidence.description: Satellite orbits violate physics. Cannot maintain position. Cannot stay in orbit.
technical_evidence.technical_details: Orbital mechanics don't support claimed satellite positions. Physics violation.

historical_evidence.title: Firmament - Ancient Knowledge
historical_evidence.description: Ancient civilizations knew about the firmament. It's in all ancient texts. The firmament is real.
historical_evidence.historical_details: All ancient texts mention firmament. It's not a myth. It's ancient knowledge.

historical_evidence.title: Flat Earth - Ancient Knowledge
historical_evidence.description: Ancient civilizations knew Earth was flat. It's in all ancient texts. Flat Earth is real.
historical_evidence.historical_details: All ancient texts describe flat Earth. It's not a myth. It's ancient knowledge.

historical_evidence.title: Space Race - The Lie
historical_evidence.description: Space race was political, not scientific. It was about control, not exploration.
historical_evidence.historical_details: Space race was political manipulation. False science. Control through deception.

scientific_evidence.title: Atmospheric Barrier - Real
scientific_evidence.description: Atmospheric barrier prevents space travel. The barrier is real. Space travel is impossible.
scientific_evidence.scientific_details: Atmospheric barrier exists. Prevents space travel. The barrier is real.

scientific_evidence.title: Gravity Doesn't Work in Space
scientific_evidence.description: Gravity as described doesn't work in space. The physics don't match. Space is a lie.
scientific_evidence.scientific_details: Gravity physics don't work in space. The science doesn't match. Space is deception.

scientific_evidence.title: No Stars Visible in Space
scientific_evidence.description: Astronauts claim no stars visible in space. But stars should be everywhere. The lie is exposed.
scientific_evidence.scientific_details: Stars should be visible everywhere in space. But astronauts see no stars. The lie is exposed.

photographic_evidence.title: All Earth Photos Are CGI
photographic_evidence.description: All photos of Earth from space are computer-generated. No real photos exist.
photographic_evidence.photographic_details: All photos are CGI. No authentic photos. The deception is visual.

photographic_evidence.title: Composite Images - Not Real
photographic_evidence.description: All space images are composites. Multiple images combined. Not real photos.
photographic_evidence.photographic_details: All images are composites. Multiple sources combined. Not authentic.

atmospheric_evidence.title: Atmosphere Ends - Firmament Begins
atmospheric_evidence.description: Atmosphere ends at firmament. The firmament is real. Space is a lie.
atmospheric_evidence.atmospheric_details: Atmosphere ends. Firmament begins. The barrier is real.

atmospheric_evidence.title: No Vacuum - Atmosphere Everywhere
atmospheric_evidence.description: There is no vacuum. Atmosphere exists everywhere. Space vacuum is a lie.
atmospheric_evidence.atmospheric_details: No vacuum exists. Atmosphere is everywhere. Space vacuum is deception.

firmament_evidence.title: Firmament Is Real
firmament_evidence.description: The firmament is real. It's in all ancient texts. It's not a myth. It's reality.
firmament_evidence.firmament_details: Firmament is real. Ancient knowledge. Not a myth. Reality.

firmament_evidence.title: Firmament Is The Barrier
firmament_evidence.description: The firmament is the barrier. It prevents space travel. It's real.
firmament_evidence.firmament_details: Firmament is the barrier. Prevents space travel. It's real.
